DrifterMod:Sixty.NAME: 60 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:Sixty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL driftermod:Drift !M! NL Next turn, gain 3 Dexterity for one turn.

DrifterMod:HairPin.NAME: Hairpin Turn
DrifterMod:HairPin.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Drift, deal !D! damage and driftermod:Drift !M!

DrifterMod:SpinOut.NAME: Spin Out
DrifterMod:SpinOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each driftermod:Drift. NL Gain !M! Thorns for each driftermod:Drift for one turn. NL Lose your driftermod:Drift.

DrifterMod:Ninety.NAME: 90 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:Ninety.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL driftermod:Drift 3. NL Gain !M! Strength while Drifting.

DrifterMod:EngineRev.NAME: Engine Rev
DrifterMod:EngineRev.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Draw !M! cards and gain !M! [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:Coast.NAME: Coast
DrifterMod:Coast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain !M! cards this turn.

DrifterMod:Tmph.NAME: 20 MPH
DrifterMod:Tmph.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! random cards from your driftermod:Total-hand to deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ( Discard 2 more cards and double this card's damage with each driftermod:Speedup. )

DrifterMod:InertialDrift.NAME: Inertial Drift
DrifterMod:InertialDrift.DESCRIPTION: Gain block and deal damage to all enemies equal to your driftermod:Drift. NL Double your driftermod:Drift. NL Exhaust

DrifterMod:NightsOnFire.NAME: Nights of Fire
DrifterMod:NightsOnFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage plus !M! for each Overdraw. NL (Deals !DrifterMod:M2! damage)

DrifterMod:BobWeave.NAME: Bob and Weave
DrifterMod:BobWeave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card next turn.
Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

DrifterMod:PolePosition.NAME: Pole Position
DrifterMod:PolePosition.DESCRIPTION: If you have Overdraw, deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block.

DrifterMod:TopSpeed.NAME: Top Speed
DrifterMod:TopSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.
DrifterMod:TopSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DrifterMod:UTurn.NAME: U-Turn
DrifterMod:UTurn.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift 2 NL Next turn, deal !D! damage to all enemies for each card in your hand plus your Overdraw.

DrifterMod:EatMyDust.NAME: Overtake
DrifterMod:EatMyDust.DESCRIPTION: Discard 3 cards to Draw !M! cards next turn.

DrifterMod:ThermalEngine.NAME: Thermal Engine
DrifterMod:ThermalEngine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if you have Overdraw, gain [E]

DrifterMod:Kachow.NAME: Headlight Flash
DrifterMod:Kachow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to all enemies.

DrifterMod:PerfectBalance.NAME: Perfect Balance
DrifterMod:PerfectBalance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Discard 3 cards. Drift 4.you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw a card.
At the start of your turn, if you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw #b cards.

DrifterMod:Dejavu.NAME: Deja Vu
DrifterMod:Dejavu.DESCRIPTION: Add an Ethereal copy of the last card you played this combat to your hand.
DrifterMod:Dejavu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Ethereal copy of the last card you played this combat to your hand.

DrifterMod:Zoom.NAME: Zoom
DrifterMod:Zoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

DrifterMod:BigCrash.NAME: Hyper Crash
DrifterMod:BigCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 3 times your driftermod:Total-Hand to all enemies. Discard your hand and lose all Overdraw. NL ( !D! damage. )

DrifterMod:InControl.NAME: In Control
DrifterMod:InControl.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card this turn, gain [E]

DrifterMod:RacingSpirit.NAME: Racing Spirit
DrifterMod:RacingSpirit.DESCRIPTION: If you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, deal !D! damage and draw !M! cards.

DrifterMod:InTheZone.NAME: In the Zone
DrifterMod:InTheZone.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card, gain 1 Block.

DrifterMod:SpeedDemon.NAME: Speed Demon
DrifterMod:SpeedDemon.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Speedup. NL Deal !M! damage for each driftermod:Speedup. NL ( !D! Damage. )

DrifterMod:HighSpeed.NAME: Speed Drifting
DrifterMod:HighSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift !M! for each driftermod:Speedup. NL driftermod:Speedup.

DrifterMod:SpeedBurst.NAME: Speed Burst
DrifterMod:SpeedBurst.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retain !M! cards this turn.

DrifterMod:FireTrail.NAME: Flame Trail
DrifterMod:FireTrail.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !M! damage to all enemies for each Overdraw.

DrifterMod:Dangerous.NAME: Dangerous Game
DrifterMod:Dangerous.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] for each Vulnerable you have.

DrifterMod:Underdog.NAME: Underdog
DrifterMod:Underdog.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is discarded, add it to your hand. NL If this is the only card in your hand at any time, draw a card. NL Ethereal.
DrifterMod:Underdog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is discarded, add it to your hand. NL If this is the only card in your hand at any time, draw a card.
